title: MSFS Sim Update 3: New Filters, Lock Configuration, and Back Up & Restore your controller settings
description:
With Microsoft Flight Simulator's Sim Update 3 officially released, you can now get a first-hand look at the new control GUI and filter system! This massive update is out now and ready for you to explore.

With the update live, it's more important than ever to have a backup of your current custom controller setup. This guide will walk you through the essential process of backing up your files so you're prepared for any changes.
